name: Please come to my christmas party
name_original: Please come to my christmas party
description:
You play as a little robot on a lonely christmas night. Your goal is to find as many friends as you can by delivering party invitations to them. They are 5 friends for you to find and 3 different endings depending on how many people you can invite, each time you got hit by an obstacle you drop 1 letter that used to invite people. Good luck!

-How to play-

Avoid obstacles by jumping or ducking until you reach all people or your letter runs out.

-Control-

W or Spacebar - Jump

S - Duck

Spacebar - Interact, Next

Our Twitter to see our activity on our main project: https://twitter.com/triplee_games
